PreOrderConfirmModalDescription: Our opening hours are from {{validTimeFrom}} to {{validTimeTo}}. But you can browse the menu & pre-order instead!
CheckIfDrinkingAge: Are you of legal drinking age?
AlcoholLimitationsMY: Our alcohol products can only be purchased by non-Muslims aged 21 years old and above.

OfflinePromptDescription: Apologies, our store is not ready to go online yet, but we will be back soon! Please try again later.
